description:
Clinton is scheduled to address the controversy around her use of a private email address while she was Secretary of State. The news conference will come after her speech on women’s empowerment at the United Nations.










 















 
















 
 
	Here are 20 Questions the team at BuzzFeed Politics believes Clinton needs to answer regarding her emails during her press conference today.

	 	  View Video ›
	  
	


 Facebook: BuzzFeedPol















  
 
 
	Watch Clinton's speech at the U.N. live here.

 
	


 




View Entire List ›
title: Hillary Clinton Expected To Address Private Emails
